bibl.title: Letter from Pedro Nogueira to Philip Showalter Hench, April 21, 1953

div1.p: Nogueira hopes that the Cuban government will agree to have medals made in honor of the people celebrated at the Camp Lazear dedication.

div1.head: Letter from Pedro Nogueira to Philip Showalter Hench, April 21, 1953
div1.opener:
DR. PEDRO NOGUEIRA
MEDICO CIRUJANO
MARTI 219, MARIANAO
TELEFONO: B0-7577
Marianao April 21 of 1953
Dr Philip Hench
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minnessota
U.S.A.
Dear Philip:
div1.p:
After a couple days of silence I am writing few lines to
send you under separate cover two copies of Dr Catro's photos placing
flowers on Lazear's bust and another copy of Mayor Crue unveiling
Lazear's bust; beside you will receive other small copies of some pho-
tos if any of them interest you to have copies you write me on the
back of them how many copies you need, and you send me, again when
you wish.

I am adjoining too, two negatives on airview taken by Mr Palo-
mino, and I send you a copy of each one, for you to see how they are
well I believe they are good.- You over there, can enlarge them on
the size you wish. Philip I pray you keep securely the negatives on
airview, why, if at any moment I should need any of them, I would
have to write you ovr there, because I dont keep any of them at all.

I hope if things run well, to attend the meeting on American
Medical Asso in June on New York, for that I have reserved room on
the Governor Clinton Hotel, for 28th May and I hope to stay there til
8th or 10th of June.

On the other hand, Philip I am making suggestion to see if possi
ble the Cuban Goverment make the Medals for the condecorated persons
on last December 3rd, and to send them. I should like the be named to
bring them the Medals; but I dont know, if I will succeed.

I regard a good help, that you write directly, to Mr Cesar Ro-
driguez, Historiador del Ministerio de Salubridad, to explain so much
that sadd persons, would be grateful to receive the Medals of the Con
decoration given by the Cuban Goverment.

Note: The address of Mr Cesar Rodriguez is the following:
Sr: Cesar Rodriguez
Historiador de Salubridad
Ministerio de Salubridad y A. Social.
Habana.- CUBA.
Many regards for Mary and waiting you reply:
